auth.title: Welcome to STOCKINO
auth.description: A universal platform to monitor stock, sales and teams in real time.
auth.content: Manage any type of product, trigger alerts automatically and export reports in a few clicks.

signin.title: Sign in
signin.organizationCodeHint: Ask your administrator for the code (optional for admins)

signup.description: Invite your team and start monitoring stock in minutes.

forgot.title: Reset password
forgot.description: Enter your email to receive a secure reset link.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Quick overview of your stock and sales.

delete.title: Delete receipt
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this receipt? Stock will be restored.

stock.title: Stock report
stock.description: Export the complete state of your stock with all product information.

sales.title: Sales report
sales.description: Analyze your sales over a given period with detailed statistics.
